mapper.insert: insert into meeting (meeting_id, user_id, meeting_location, meeting_description, meeting_time, meeting_create_time, class_id, photo_id) values (#{meetingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{meetingLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetingDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{meetingCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{photoId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update meeting set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, meeting_location = #{meetingLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meeting_description = #{meetingDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meeting_time = #{meetingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, meeting_create_time = #{meetingCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, photo_id = #{photoId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where meeting_id = #{meetingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select meeting_id, user_id, meeting_location, meeting_description, meeting_time, meeting_create_time, class_id, photo_id from meeting where meeting_id = #{meetingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select meeting_id, user_id, meeting_location, meeting_description, meeting_time, meeting_create_time, class_id, photo_id from meeting
